page.title: 13Wendover Clubs And Pastimes
page.content: Wendover residents enjoy a wide range of organised activities including Squash, Tennis and Swimming Clubs which are popular with all ages. The Wendover Society is well supported and acts as a political spokesman concerned with the quality of life and changes within the village. The Mothers Club and British Legion are well attended and for children there are several thriving Cubs, Scouts, Brownies and Guide packs besides dancing classes, Junior football and gymnastics clubs. Walking, swimming and sporting pursuits are the most popular family activities mentioned by Wendover residents but D.I.Y and gardening feature as important pastimes. Recently the village has been especially concerned with the effects of the proposed bypass.
